encounter.announce: Alec is sitting in the middle of the floor, playing Rust. He looks up angrily!
encounter.name: Alec The Rusted

abilities.att: 1:plays Rust, builds a honeycomb base, and makes you pay for it! He reaches out:g10

encounter.win: You break his laptop. Alec dies from sadness.

encounter.name: WIBBENMEYER The Puppet Master

abilities.att: 3:Sends his puppets to steal your gold:g5

encounter.win: Wib dies, and you take on the name of Puppet Master.
encounter.lose: You are dead. You become a puppet in Wib's eternal army of damnation.

encounter.name: Nick J. Boi
encounter.win: Dat Boi has been curshed. You dab on him!
encounter.lose: You get dabbed on like the hater you are. You die instantly.
